page.title: 16FLOWER GROWING AT MARKS TEY
page.content: The{Poplar Nurseries}is owned by{Mr {Cowan}.He has owned it for{25}years. {Mr Cowan}grows{20,000}Fuschias,{35,000 Geraniums,{100,000}Chrysanthemums and{ {20,000}assorted flowers each year from cuttings.{50%}of the flowers people buy at the{Nurseries}shop.The others go to the Covent Garden Market in London.{Mr Cowan}works for{12}hours every day.In a year{Mr Cowan}employs{3 full time workers and{4-5}part time workers.The Nurseries has been going since{1938}.{Mr Cowan}owns{12}acres of land.The Poplar Nurseries is always changing.{3}years ago they concentrated on Chrysanthemums,growing a million stems.Now they are concentrating on building up their own shop trade and next year they are going into shrub production. A speciality is hanging baskets and they made{3200}this year.
